subTitle: A Testing Instance of the COSCRAD Platform
about: This is a test instance of the COSCRAD web of knowledge UI.  COSCRAD stands for Collective of Open Source Cultural Research and Development and is a team of creatives, software engineers and developers who are building this Web of Knowledge Platform to support different forms of community-based cultural research and archiving.  For more information please contact coscrad@gmail.com
siteDescription: This is a sample implementation of the COSCRAD Web of Knowledge for a member of the COSCRAD Cultural Research Platform which is a tool for community-based research that enables flexible connections between distinct types of content and media.
copyrightHolder: A COSCRAD Organization: Collective of Open Source Cultural Research and Development

songIdToCredits.1: Blake on the air guitar solo
